Aasimar.Description: Aasimar are mortals who carry a spark of the Upper Planes within their souls. They can fan that spark to bring light, ease wounds, and unleash the fury of the heavens. Aasimar can arise among any population of mortals, resembling their parents but living up to 160 years with subtle celestial features that become more obvious as they mature.

Celestial Features.1: A dusting of metallic, white, or charcoal freckles
Celestial Features.4: An unusual hue tinting your shadow
Celestial Features.5: A ghostly halo crowning your head

Option1.Restrictions: You can't raise any of your scores above 20.

Option2.Restrictions: You can't raise any of your scores above 20.

Size.Note: You choose the size when you select this race.

Darkvision.Description: You can see in dim light as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in darkness only as shades of gray.

Celestial Resistance.Description: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage.

Healing Hands.Effect: Touch a creature and roll a number of d4s equal to your proficiency bonus. The creature regains hit points equal to the total rolled.

Celestial Revelation.Duration: 1 minute or until ended as a bonus action

Necrotic Shroud.Description: Eyes become pools of darkness, ghostly wings sprout. Creatures within 10 feet must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or become frightened. You deal extra necrotic damage equal to your proficiency bonus once per turn.
Necrotic Shroud.Save DC: 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier

Radiant Consumption.Description: Searing light radiates from your eyes and mouth. You shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. Each creature within 10 feet takes radiant damage equal to your proficiency bonus at the end of each of your turns. You deal extra radiant damage equal to your proficiency bonus once per turn.

Radiant Soul.Description: Luminous, spectral wings sprout. You gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed. You deal extra radiant damage equal to your proficiency bonus once per turn.

Aasimar.Languages: Common and one additional language chosen with your DM
